bigMacPriceInfo: Amount divided by the price of a Big Mac
introText1: Ever wondered how much WoW has drained from your wallet? Spoiler: it's more than your epic armor set!
introText2: Between your subscription, stylish mounts, and those cosmetics, the bill might hit harder than a final expansion raid!
introText3: Enter your region, server, and character, and in less time than a /w command, you'll find out how much you've actually spent. No account creation required, just the truth... a little brutal!
removeAdblock: Disable your ad blocker, it's like a buff that unlocks secret info!
removeAdblockPie: These details are protected by an illusion spell! Disable your ad blocker to uncover the mystery.

share.title: Raid Brag
share.question: True heroes of Azeroth aren't afraid to show off their spending. What about you, brave adventurer?
share.twitter1: I found out how much I've spent on WoW... Spoiler: it could've bought several legendary mounts!
share.twitter2: And you, ready to face the truth? Or will you run like a thief on his tiger mount?

wowchievement.title: Wowchievement
wowchievement.question1: Want to track your achievements and reputation quests?
wowchievement.question2: Check out this site to never miss out!

meta.title: SpentOnWoW.com
meta.description: Calculate your spending on World of Warcraft, subscriptions, microtransactions, and in-game purchases. Find out how much youâ€™ve actually invested... in this never-ending quest!
meta.descriptionDashboard: Want to know how much I've spent on WoW? The answer is in the chest... or maybe in your backpack!

legalMention.identificationContent: The SpentOnWow.com site is published by individuals. In accordance with Article 6-III of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004 for confidence in the digital economy, the publisher's personal details are kept by the site host.
legalMention.intellectualContent: The content of the SpentOnWow.com site, such as texts, graphics, logos, images, and other elements, is protected by intellectual property laws. Reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of any part of the site is prohibited without prior written authorization.
legalMention.personalDataContent: The SpentOnWow.com site does not collect any personal data. No account creation or personal information is required to use the service.
legalMention.liabilityContent: The SpentOnWow.com site offers a service to track character achievements and reputation in World of Warcraft. The information presented is based on publicly available data, and SpentOnWow.com is not responsible for errors or outdated information. The site is provided for informational purposes and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Blizzard Entertainment.
legalMention.editContent: These legal notices may be modified at any time. It is recommended to regularly check this page to stay informed of any updates.
legalMention.rightContent: These legal notices are governed by French law. In case of a dispute, and in the absence of an amicable solution, French courts will have jurisdiction.
legalMention.dataCollectContent: The SpentOnWow.com site does not collect any personal data from users. No account creation or entry of personal information (such as name, email address, etc.) is required to use the services provided by the site. Users can consult their character information in World of Warcraft without providing personal information.
legalMention.dataAutomaticContent1: The SpentOnWow.com site uses Plausible Analytics, a privacy-friendly traffic analysis tool. Plausible does not collect personal data, does not use cookies, and does not track users across multiple sites. Plausible works by collecting anonymized information such as:
legalMention.dataAutomaticStep1: The number of visitors to the site.
legalMention.dataAutomaticStep3: Traffic sources (how users arrive at the site).
legalMention.dataAutomaticContent2: This data is purely statistical and does not allow identifying visitors. It is used solely to understand how the site is used and to improve it.
legalMention.linkContent: The SpentOnWow.com site may include links to third-party websites. These links are provided for informational purposes, and SpentOnWow.com is not responsible for the content of external sites. Users are encouraged to consult the privacy and cookie policies of these third-party sites before interacting with them.
